00068 /* *** utility code to set up an individual raytree for objectinstance, for checking inside/outside *** */
00069 
00070 /* Recursive test for intersections, from a point inside the mesh, to outside
00071  * Number of intersections (depth) determine if a point is inside or outside the mesh */
00072 static int intersect_outside_volume(RayObject *tree, Isect *isect, float *offset, int limit, int depth)
00073 {
00074     if (limit == 0) return depth;
00075     
00076     if (RE_rayobject_raycast(tree, isect)) {
00077         
00078         isect->start[0] = isect->start[0] + isect->dist*isect->dir[0];
00079         isect->start[1] = isect->start[1] + isect->dist*isect->dir[1];
00080         isect->start[2] = isect->start[2] + isect->dist*isect->dir[2];
00081         
00082         isect->dist = FLT_MAX;
00083         isect->skip = RE_SKIP_VLR_NEIGHBOUR;
00084         isect->orig.face= isect->hit.face;
00085         isect->orig.ob= isect->hit.ob;
00086         
00087         return intersect_outside_volume(tree, isect, offset, limit-1, depth+1);
00088     }
00089     else {
00090         return depth;
00091     }
00092 }
00093 
00094 /* Uses ray tracing to check if a point is inside or outside an ObjectInstanceRen */
00095 static int point_inside_obi(RayObject *tree, ObjectInstanceRen *UNUSED(obi), float *co)
00096 {
00097     Isect isect= {{0}};
00098     float dir[3] = {0.0f,0.0f,1.0f};
00099     int final_depth=0, depth=0, limit=20;
00100     
00101     /* set up the isect */
00102     copy_v3_v3(isect.start, co);
00103     copy_v3_v3(isect.dir, dir);
00104     isect.mode= RE_RAY_MIRROR;
00105     isect.last_hit= NULL;
00106     isect.lay= -1;
00107     
00108     isect.dist = FLT_MAX;
00109     isect.orig.face= NULL;
00110     isect.orig.ob = NULL;
00111 
00112     final_depth = intersect_outside_volume(tree, &isect, dir, limit, depth);
00113     
00114     /* even number of intersections: point is outside
00115      * odd number: point is inside */
00116     if (final_depth % 2 == 0) return 0;
00117     else return 1;
00118 }
00119 
00120 /* find the bounding box of an objectinstance in global space */
00121 void global_bounds_obi(Render *re, ObjectInstanceRen *obi, float *bbmin, float *bbmax)
00122 {
00123     ObjectRen *obr = obi->obr;
00124     VolumePrecache *vp = obi->volume_precache;
00125     VertRen *ver= NULL;
00126     float co[3];
00127     int a;
00128     
00129     if (vp->bbmin != NULL && vp->bbmax != NULL) {
00130         copy_v3_v3(bbmin, vp->bbmin);
00131         copy_v3_v3(bbmax, vp->bbmax);
00132         return;
00133     }
00134     
00135     vp->bbmin = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*3, "volume precache min boundbox corner");
00136     vp->bbmax = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*3, "volume precache max boundbox corner");
00137     
00138     INIT_MINMAX(bbmin, bbmax);
00139     
00140     for (a=0; a<obr->totvert; a++) {
00141         if ((a & 255)==0) ver= obr->vertnodes[a>>8].vert;
00142         else ver++;
00143         
00144         copy_v3_v3(co, ver->co);
00145         
00146         /* transformed object instance in camera space */
00147         if (obi->flag & R_TRANSFORMED)
00148             mul_m4_v3(obi->mat, co);
00149         
00150         /* convert to global space */
00151         mul_m4_v3(re->viewinv, co);
00152         
00153         DO_MINMAX(co, vp->bbmin, vp->bbmax);
00154     }
00155     
00156     copy_v3_v3(bbmin, vp->bbmin);
00157     copy_v3_v3(bbmax, vp->bbmax);
00158     
00159 }

00161 /* *** light cache filtering *** */
00162 
00163 static float get_avg_surrounds(float *cache, int *res, int xx, int yy, int zz)
00164 {
00165     int x, y, z, x_, y_, z_;
00166     int added=0;
00167     float tot=0.0f;
00168     
00169     for (z=-1; z <= 1; z++) {
00170         z_ = zz+z;
00171         if (z_ >= 0 && z_ <= res[2]-1) {
00172         
00173             for (y=-1; y <= 1; y++) {
00174                 y_ = yy+y;
00175                 if (y_ >= 0 && y_ <= res[1]-1) {
00176                 
00177                     for (x=-1; x <= 1; x++) {
00178                         x_ = xx+x;
00179                         if (x_ >= 0 && x_ <= res[0]-1) {
00180                             const int i= V_I(x_, y_, z_, res);
00181                             
00182                             if (cache[i] > 0.0f) {
00183                                 tot += cache[i];
00184                                 added++;
00185                             }
00186                             
00187                         }
00188                     }
00189                 }
00190             }
00191         }
00192     }
00193     
00194     if (added > 0) tot /= added;
00195     
00196     return tot;
00197 }
00198 
00199 /* function to filter the edges of the light cache, where there was no volume originally.
00200  * For each voxel which was originally external to the mesh, it finds the average values of
00201  * the surrounding internal voxels and sets the original external voxel to that average amount.
00202  * Works almost a bit like a 'dilate' filter */
00203 static void lightcache_filter(VolumePrecache *vp)
00204 {
00205     int x, y, z;
00206 
00207     for (z=0; z < vp->res[2]; z++) {
00208         for (y=0; y < vp->res[1]; y++) {
00209             for (x=0; x < vp->res[0]; x++) {
00210                 /* trigger for outside mesh */
00211                 const int i= V_I(x, y, z, vp->res);
00212                 
00213                 if (vp->data_r[i] < -0.f)
00214                     vp->data_r[i] = get_avg_surrounds(vp->data_r, vp->res, x, y, z);
00215                 if (vp->data_g[i] < -0.f)
00216                     vp->data_g[i] = get_avg_surrounds(vp->data_g, vp->res, x, y, z);
00217                 if (vp->data_b[i] < -0.f)
00218                     vp->data_b[i] = get_avg_surrounds(vp->data_b, vp->res, x, y, z);
00219             }
00220         }
00221     }
00222 }

00225 static void lightcache_filter2(VolumePrecache *vp)
00226 {
00227     int x, y, z;
00228     float *new_r, *new_g, *new_b;
00229     int field_size = vp->res[0]*vp->res[1]*vp->res[2]*sizeof(float);
00230     
00231     new_r = MEM_mallocN(field_size, "temp buffer for light cache filter r channel");
00232     new_g = MEM_mallocN(field_size, "temp buffer for light cache filter g channel");
00233     new_b = MEM_mallocN(field_size, "temp buffer for light cache filter b channel");

00235     memcpy(new_r, vp->data_r, field_size);
00236     memcpy(new_g, vp->data_g, field_size);
00237     memcpy(new_b, vp->data_b, field_size);
00238     
00239     for (z=0; z < vp->res[2]; z++) {
00240         for (y=0; y < vp->res[1]; y++) {
00241             for (x=0; x < vp->res[0]; x++) {
00242                 /* trigger for outside mesh */
00243                 const int i= V_I(x, y, z, vp->res);
00244                 if (vp->data_r[i] < -0.f)
00245                     new_r[i] = get_avg_surrounds(vp->data_r, vp->res, x, y, z);
00246                 if (vp->data_g[i] < -0.f)
00247                     new_g[i] = get_avg_surrounds(vp->data_g, vp->res, x, y, z);
00248                 if (vp->data_b[i] < -0.f)
00249                     new_b[i] = get_avg_surrounds(vp->data_b, vp->res, x, y, z);
00250             }
00251         }
00252     }
00253     
00254     SWAP(float *, vp->data_r, new_r);
00255     SWAP(float *, vp->data_g, new_g);
00256     SWAP(float *, vp->data_b, new_b);
00257     
00258     if (new_r) { MEM_freeN(new_r); new_r=NULL; }
00259     if (new_g) { MEM_freeN(new_g); new_g=NULL; }
00260     if (new_b) { MEM_freeN(new_b); new_b=NULL; }

00263 
00264 BLI_INLINE int ms_I(int x, int y, int z, int *n) //has a pad of 1 voxel surrounding the core for boundary simulation
00265 { 
00266     /* different ordering to light cache */
00267     return x*(n[1]+2)*(n[2]+2) + y*(n[2]+2) + z;    
00268 }
00269 
00270 BLI_INLINE int v_I_pad(int x, int y, int z, int *n) //has a pad of 1 voxel surrounding the core for boundary simulation
00271 { 
00272     /* same ordering to light cache, with padding */
00273     return z*(n[1]+2)*(n[0]+2) + y*(n[0]+2) + x;    
00274 }
00275 
00276 BLI_INLINE int lc_to_ms_I(int x, int y, int z, int *n)
00277 { 
00278     /* converting light cache index to multiple scattering index */
00279     return (x-1)*(n[1]*n[2]) + (y-1)*(n[2]) + z-1;
00280 }
00281 
00282 /* *** multiple scattering approximation *** */
00283 
00284 /* get the total amount of light energy in the light cache. used to normalize after multiple scattering */
00285 static float total_ss_energy(Render *re, int do_test_break, VolumePrecache *vp)
00286 {
00287     int x, y, z;
00288     int *res = vp->res;
00289     float energy=0.f;
00290     
00291     for (z=0; z < res[2]; z++) {
00292         for (y=0; y < res[1]; y++) {
00293             for (x=0; x < res[0]; x++) {
00294                 const int i=V_I(x, y, z, res);
00295             
00296                 if (vp->data_r[i] > 0.f) energy += vp->data_r[i];
00297                 if (vp->data_g[i] > 0.f) energy += vp->data_g[i];
00298                 if (vp->data_b[i] > 0.f) energy += vp->data_b[i];
00299             }
00300         }
00301 
00302         if (do_test_break && re->test_break(re->tbh)) break;
00303     }
00304     
00305     return energy;
00306 }
00307 
00308 static float total_ms_energy(Render *re, int do_test_break, float *sr, float *sg, float *sb, int *res)
00309 {
00310     int x, y, z;
00311     float energy=0.f;
00312     
00313     for (z=1;z<=res[2];z++) {
00314         for (y=1;y<=res[1];y++) {
00315             for (x=1;x<=res[0];x++) {
00316                 const int i = ms_I(x,y,z,res);
00317                 
00318                 if (sr[i] > 0.f) energy += sr[i];
00319                 if (sg[i] > 0.f) energy += sg[i];
00320                 if (sb[i] > 0.f) energy += sb[i];
00321             }
00322         }
00323 
00324         if (do_test_break && re->test_break(re->tbh)) break;
00325     }
00326     
00327     return energy;
00328 }
00329 
00330 static void ms_diffuse(Render *re, int do_test_break, float *x0, float *x, float diff, int *n) //n is the unpadded resolution
00331 {
00332     int i, j, k, l;
00333     const float dt = VOL_MS_TIMESTEP;
00334     size_t size = n[0]*n[1]*n[2];
00335     const float a = dt*diff*size;
00336     
00337     for (l=0; l<20; l++)
00338     {
00339         for (k=1; k<=n[2]; k++)
00340         {
00341             for (j=1; j<=n[1]; j++)
00342             {
00343                 for (i=1; i<=n[0]; i++)
00344                 {
00345                    x[v_I_pad(i,j,k,n)] = (x0[v_I_pad(i,j,k,n)]) + a*(   x0[v_I_pad(i-1,j,k,n)]+ x0[v_I_pad(i+1,j,k,n)]+ x0[v_I_pad(i,j-1,k,n)]+
00346                                                                         x0[v_I_pad(i,j+1,k,n)]+ x0[v_I_pad(i,j,k-1,n)]+x0[v_I_pad(i,j,k+1,n)]
00347                                                                         ) / (1+6*a);
00348                 }
00349             }
00350 
00351             if (do_test_break && re->test_break(re->tbh)) break;
00352         }
00353 
00354         if (re->test_break(re->tbh)) break;
00355     }
00356 }
00357 
00358 static void multiple_scattering_diffusion(Render *re, VolumePrecache *vp, Material *ma)
00359 {
00360     const float diff = ma->vol.ms_diff * 0.001f;    /* compensate for scaling for a nicer UI range */
00361     const int simframes = (int)(ma->vol.ms_spread * (float)MAX3(vp->res[0], vp->res[1], vp->res[2]));
00362     const int shade_type = ma->vol.shade_type;
00363     float fac = ma->vol.ms_intensity;
00364     
00365     int x, y, z, m;
00366     int *n = vp->res;
00367     const int size = (n[0]+2)*(n[1]+2)*(n[2]+2);
00368     const int do_test_break = (size > 100000);
00369     double time, lasttime= PIL_check_seconds_timer();
00370     float total;
00371     float c=1.0f;
00372     float origf;    /* factor for blending in original light cache */
00373     float energy_ss, energy_ms;
00374 
00375     float *sr0=(float *)MEM_callocN(size*sizeof(float), "temporary multiple scattering buffer");
00376     float *sr=(float *)MEM_callocN(size*sizeof(float), "temporary multiple scattering buffer");
00377     float *sg0=(float *)MEM_callocN(size*sizeof(float), "temporary multiple scattering buffer");
00378     float *sg=(float *)MEM_callocN(size*sizeof(float), "temporary multiple scattering buffer");
00379     float *sb0=(float *)MEM_callocN(size*sizeof(float), "temporary multiple scattering buffer");
00380     float *sb=(float *)MEM_callocN(size*sizeof(float), "temporary multiple scattering buffer");
00381 
00382     total = (float)(n[0]*n[1]*n[2]*simframes);
00383     
00384     energy_ss = total_ss_energy(re, do_test_break, vp);
00385     
00386     /* Scattering as diffusion pass */
00387     for (m=0; m<simframes; m++)
00388     {
00389         /* add sources */
00390         for (z=1; z<=n[2]; z++)
00391         {
00392             for (y=1; y<=n[1]; y++)
00393             {
00394                 for (x=1; x<=n[0]; x++)
00395                 {
00396                     const int i = lc_to_ms_I(x, y ,z, n);   //lc index                  
00397                     const int j = ms_I(x, y, z, n);         //ms index
00398                     
00399                     time= PIL_check_seconds_timer();
00400                     c++;                                        
00401                     if (vp->data_r[i] > 0.0f)
00402                         sr[j] += vp->data_r[i];
00403                     if (vp->data_g[i] > 0.0f)
00404                         sg[j] += vp->data_g[i];
00405                     if (vp->data_b[i] > 0.0f)
00406                         sb[j] += vp->data_b[i];
00407                     
00408                     /* Displays progress every second */
00409                     if (time-lasttime>1.0) {
00410                         char str[64];
00411                         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Simulating multiple scattering: %d%%", (int)(100.0f * (c / total)));
00412                         re->i.infostr= str;
00413                         re->stats_draw(re->sdh, &re->i);
00414                         re->i.infostr= NULL;
00415                         lasttime= time;
00416                     }
00417                 }
00418             }
00419 
00420             if (do_test_break && re->test_break(re->tbh)) break;
00421         }
00422 
00423         if (re->test_break(re->tbh)) break;
00424 
00425         SWAP(float *,sr,sr0);
00426         SWAP(float *,sg,sg0);
00427         SWAP(float *,sb,sb0);
00428 
00429         /* main diffusion simulation */
00430         ms_diffuse(re, do_test_break, sr0, sr, diff, n);
00431         ms_diffuse(re, do_test_break, sg0, sg, diff, n);
00432         ms_diffuse(re, do_test_break, sb0, sb, diff, n);
00433         
00434         if (re->test_break(re->tbh)) break;
00435     }
00436     
00437     /* normalization factor to conserve energy */
00438     energy_ms = total_ms_energy(re, do_test_break, sr, sg, sb, n);
00439     fac *= (energy_ss / energy_ms);
00440     
00441     /* blend multiple scattering back in the light cache */
00442     if (shade_type == MA_VOL_SHADE_SHADEDPLUSMULTIPLE) {
00443         /* conserve energy - half single, half multiple */
00444         origf = 0.5f;
00445         fac *= 0.5f;
00446     }
00447     else {
00448         origf = 0.0f;
00449     }
00450 
00451     for (z=1;z<=n[2];z++)
00452     {
00453         for (y=1;y<=n[1];y++)
00454         {
00455             for (x=1;x<=n[0];x++)
00456             {
00457                 const int i = lc_to_ms_I(x, y ,z, n);   //lc index                  
00458                 const int j = ms_I(x, y, z, n);         //ms index
00459                 
00460                 vp->data_r[i] = origf * vp->data_r[i] + fac * sr[j];
00461                 vp->data_g[i] = origf * vp->data_g[i] + fac * sg[j];
00462                 vp->data_b[i] = origf * vp->data_b[i] + fac * sb[j];
00463             }
00464         }
00465 
00466         if (do_test_break && re->test_break(re->tbh)) break;
00467     }
00468 
00469     MEM_freeN(sr0);
00470     MEM_freeN(sr);
00471     MEM_freeN(sg0);
00472     MEM_freeN(sg);
00473     MEM_freeN(sb0);
00474     MEM_freeN(sb);
00475 }

00493 
00494 typedef struct VolPrecacheQueue {
00495     ThreadQueue *work;
00496     ThreadQueue *done;
00497 } VolPrecacheQueue;
00498 
00499 /* Iterate over the 3d voxel grid, and fill the voxels with scattering information
00500  *
00501  * It's stored in memory as 3 big float grids next to each other, one for each RGB channel.
00502  * I'm guessing the memory alignment may work out better this way for the purposes
00503  * of doing linear interpolation, but I haven't actually tested this theory! :)
00504  */
00505 static void *vol_precache_part(void *data)
00506 {
00507     VolPrecacheQueue *queue = (VolPrecacheQueue*)data;
00508     VolPrecachePart *pa;
00509 
00510     while ((pa = BLI_thread_queue_pop(queue->work))) {
00511         ObjectInstanceRen *obi = pa->obi;
00512         RayObject *tree = pa->tree;
00513         ShadeInput *shi = pa->shi;
00514         float scatter_col[3] = {0.f, 0.f, 0.f};
00515         float co[3], cco[3], view[3];
00516         int x, y, z, i;
00517         int res[3];
00518 
00519         if (pa->re->test_break && pa->re->test_break(pa->re->tbh))
00520             break;
00521 
00522         res[0]= pa->res[0];
00523         res[1]= pa->res[1];
00524         res[2]= pa->res[2];
00525 
00526         for (z= pa->minz; z < pa->maxz; z++) {
00527             co[2] = pa->bbmin[2] + (pa->voxel[2] * (z + 0.5f));
00528             
00529             for (y= pa->miny; y < pa->maxy; y++) {
00530                 co[1] = pa->bbmin[1] + (pa->voxel[1] * (y + 0.5f));
00531                 
00532                 for (x=pa->minx; x < pa->maxx; x++) {
00533                     co[0] = pa->bbmin[0] + (pa->voxel[0] * (x + 0.5f));
00534                     
00535                     if (pa->re->test_break && pa->re->test_break(pa->re->tbh))
00536                         break;
00537                     
00538                     /* convert from world->camera space for shading */
00539                     mul_v3_m4v3(cco, pa->viewmat, co);
00540                     
00541                     i= V_I(x, y, z, res);
00542                     
00543                     // don't bother if the point is not inside the volume mesh
00544                     if (!point_inside_obi(tree, obi, cco)) {
00545                         obi->volume_precache->data_r[i] = -1.0f;
00546                         obi->volume_precache->data_g[i] = -1.0f;
00547                         obi->volume_precache->data_b[i] = -1.0f;
00548                         continue;
00549                     }
00550                     
00551                     copy_v3_v3(view, cco);
00552                     normalize_v3(view);
00553                     vol_get_scattering(shi, scatter_col, cco, view);
00554                 
00555                     obi->volume_precache->data_r[i] = scatter_col[0];
00556                     obi->volume_precache->data_g[i] = scatter_col[1];
00557                     obi->volume_precache->data_b[i] = scatter_col[2];
00558                     
00559                 }
00560             }
00561         }
00562 
00563         BLI_thread_queue_push(queue->done, pa);
00564     }
00565     
00566     return NULL;
00567 }
00568 
00569 
00570 static void precache_setup_shadeinput(Render *re, ObjectInstanceRen *obi, Material *ma, ShadeInput *shi)
00571 {
00572     memset(shi, 0, sizeof(ShadeInput)); 
00573     shi->depth= 1;
00574     shi->mask= 1;
00575     shi->mat = ma;
00576     shi->vlr = NULL;
00577     memcpy(&shi->r, &shi->mat->r, 23*sizeof(float));    // note, keep this synced with render_types.h
00578     shi->har= shi->mat->har;
00579     shi->obi= obi;
00580     shi->obr= obi->obr;
00581     shi->lay = re->lay;
00582 }
00583 
00584 static void precache_init_parts(Render *re, RayObject *tree, ShadeInput *shi, ObjectInstanceRen *obi, int totthread, int *parts)
00585 {
00586     VolumePrecache *vp = obi->volume_precache;
00587     int i=0, x, y, z;
00588     float voxel[3];
00589     int sizex, sizey, sizez;
00590     float bbmin[3], bbmax[3];
00591     int *res;
00592     int minx, maxx;
00593     int miny, maxy;
00594     int minz, maxz;
00595     
00596     if (!vp) return;
00597 
00598     BLI_freelistN(&re->volume_precache_parts);
00599     
00600     /* currently we just subdivide the box, number of threads per side */
00601     parts[0] = parts[1] = parts[2] = totthread;
00602     res = vp->res;
00603     
00604     /* using boundbox in worldspace */
00605     global_bounds_obi(re, obi, bbmin, bbmax);
00606     sub_v3_v3v3(voxel, bbmax, bbmin);
00607     
00608     voxel[0] /= (float)res[0];
00609     voxel[1] /= (float)res[1];
00610     voxel[2] /= (float)res[2];
00611 
00612     for (x=0; x < parts[0]; x++) {
00613         sizex = ceil(res[0] / (float)parts[0]);
00614         minx = x * sizex;
00615         maxx = minx + sizex;
00616         maxx = (maxx>res[0])?res[0]:maxx;
00617         
00618         for (y=0; y < parts[1]; y++) {
00619             sizey = ceil(res[1] / (float)parts[1]);
00620             miny = y * sizey;
00621             maxy = miny + sizey;
00622             maxy = (maxy>res[1])?res[1]:maxy;
00623             
00624             for (z=0; z < parts[2]; z++) {
00625                 VolPrecachePart *pa= MEM_callocN(sizeof(VolPrecachePart), "new precache part");
00626                 
00627                 sizez = ceil(res[2] / (float)parts[2]);
00628                 minz = z * sizez;
00629                 maxz = minz + sizez;
00630                 maxz = (maxz>res[2])?res[2]:maxz;
00631                 
00632                 pa->re = re;
00633                 pa->num = i;
00634                 pa->tree = tree;
00635                 pa->shi = shi;
00636                 pa->obi = obi;
00637                 copy_m4_m4(pa->viewmat, re->viewmat);
00638                 
00639                 copy_v3_v3(pa->bbmin, bbmin);
00640                 copy_v3_v3(pa->voxel, voxel);
00641                 copy_v3_v3_int(pa->res, res);
00642                 
00643                 pa->minx = minx; pa->maxx = maxx;
00644                 pa->miny = miny; pa->maxy = maxy;
00645                 pa->minz = minz; pa->maxz = maxz;
00646                 
00647                 
00648                 BLI_addtail(&re->volume_precache_parts, pa);
00649                 
00650                 i++;
00651             }
00652         }
00653     }
00654 }
00655 
00656 /* calculate resolution from bounding box in world space */
00657 static int precache_resolution(Render *re, VolumePrecache *vp, ObjectInstanceRen *obi, int res)
00658 {
00659     float dim[3], div;
00660     float bbmin[3], bbmax[3];
00661     
00662     /* bound box in global space */
00663     global_bounds_obi(re, obi, bbmin, bbmax);
00664     sub_v3_v3v3(dim, bbmax, bbmin);
00665     
00666     div = MAX3(dim[0], dim[1], dim[2]);
00667     dim[0] /= div;
00668     dim[1] /= div;
00669     dim[2] /= div;
00670     
00671     vp->res[0] = ceil(dim[0] * res);
00672     vp->res[1] = ceil(dim[1] * res);
00673     vp->res[2] = ceil(dim[2] * res);
00674     
00675     if ((vp->res[0] < 1) || (vp->res[1] < 1) || (vp->res[2] < 1))
00676         return 0;
00677     
00678     return 1;
00679 }
00680 
00681 /* Precache a volume into a 3D voxel grid.
00682  * The voxel grid is stored in the ObjectInstanceRen, 
00683  * in camera space, aligned with the ObjectRen's bounding box.
00684  * Resolution is defined by the user.
00685  */
00686 static void vol_precache_objectinstance_threads(Render *re, ObjectInstanceRen *obi, Material *ma)
00687 {
00688     VolumePrecache *vp;
00689     VolPrecachePart *pa;
00690     RayObject *tree;
00691     ShadeInput shi;
00692     ListBase threads;
00693     VolPrecacheQueue queue;
00694     int parts[3] = {1, 1, 1}, totparts;
00695     
00696     int counter=0;
00697     int totthread = re->r.threads, thread;
00698     
00699     double time, lasttime= PIL_check_seconds_timer();
00700     
00701     R = *re;
00702 
00703     /* create a raytree with just the faces of the instanced ObjectRen, 
00704      * used for checking if the cached point is inside or outside. */
00705     tree = makeraytree_object(&R, obi);
00706     if (!tree) return;
00707 
00708     vp = MEM_callocN(sizeof(VolumePrecache), "volume light cache");
00709     obi->volume_precache = vp;
00710     
00711     if (!precache_resolution(re, vp, obi, ma->vol.precache_resolution)) {
00712         MEM_freeN(vp);
00713         vp = NULL;
00714         return;
00715     }
00716 
00717     vp->data_r = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*vp->res[0]*vp->res[1]*vp->res[2], "volume light cache data red channel");
00718     vp->data_g = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*vp->res[0]*vp->res[1]*vp->res[2], "volume light cache data green channel");
00719     vp->data_b = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*vp->res[0]*vp->res[1]*vp->res[2], "volume light cache data blue channel");
00720     if (vp->data_r==NULL || vp->data_g==NULL || vp->data_b==NULL) {
00721         MEM_freeN(vp);
00722         return;
00723     }
00724 
00725     /* Need a shadeinput to calculate scattering */
00726     precache_setup_shadeinput(re, obi, ma, &shi);
00727     
00728     precache_init_parts(re, tree, &shi, obi, totthread, parts);
00729     totparts = parts[0] * parts[1] * parts[2];
00730 
00731     /* setup work and done queues */
00732     queue.work = BLI_thread_queue_init();
00733     queue.done = BLI_thread_queue_init();
00734     BLI_thread_queue_nowait(queue.work);
00735 
00736     for (pa= re->volume_precache_parts.first; pa; pa= pa->next)
00737         BLI_thread_queue_push(queue.work, pa);
00738     
00739     /* launch threads */
00740     BLI_init_threads(&threads, vol_precache_part, totthread);
00741 
00742     for (thread= 0; thread<totthread; thread++)
00743         BLI_insert_thread(&threads, &queue);
00744     
00745     /* loop waiting for work to be done */
00746     while (counter < totparts) {
00747         if (re->test_break && re->test_break(re->tbh))
00748             break;
00749 
00750         if (BLI_thread_queue_pop_timeout(queue.done, 50))
00751             counter++;
00752 
00753         time= PIL_check_seconds_timer();
00754         if (time-lasttime>1.0) {
00755             char str[64];
00756             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Precaching volume: %d%%", (int)(100.0f * ((float)counter / (float)totparts)));
00757             re->i.infostr= str;
00758             re->stats_draw(re->sdh, &re->i);
00759             re->i.infostr= NULL;
00760             lasttime= time;
00761         }
00762     }
00763     
00764     /* free */
00765     BLI_end_threads(&threads);
00766     BLI_thread_queue_free(queue.work);
00767     BLI_thread_queue_free(queue.done);
00768     BLI_freelistN(&re->volume_precache_parts);
00769     
00770     if (tree) {
00771         //TODO: makeraytree_object creates a tree and saves it on OBI, if we free this tree we should also clear other pointers to it
00772         //RE_rayobject_free(tree);
00773         //tree= NULL;
00774     }
00775     
00776     if (ELEM(ma->vol.shade_type, MA_VOL_SHADE_MULTIPLE, MA_VOL_SHADE_SHADEDPLUSMULTIPLE)) {
00777         /* this should be before the filtering */
00778         multiple_scattering_diffusion(re, obi->volume_precache, ma);
00779     }
00780         
00781     lightcache_filter(obi->volume_precache);
00782 }
00783 
00784 static int using_lightcache(Material *ma)
00785 {
00786     return (((ma->vol.shadeflag & MA_VOL_PRECACHESHADING) && (ma->vol.shade_type == MA_VOL_SHADE_SHADED)) ||
00787             (ELEM(ma->vol.shade_type, MA_VOL_SHADE_MULTIPLE, MA_VOL_SHADE_SHADEDPLUSMULTIPLE)));
00788 }
00789 
00790 /* loop through all objects (and their associated materials)
00791  * marked for pre-caching in convertblender.c, and pre-cache them */
00792 void volume_precache(Render *re)
00793 {
00794     ObjectInstanceRen *obi;
00795     VolumeOb *vo;
00796 
00797     re->i.infostr= "Volume preprocessing";
00798     re->stats_draw(re->sdh, &re->i);
00799 
00800     for (vo= re->volumes.first; vo; vo= vo->next) {
00801         if (using_lightcache(vo->ma)) {
00802             for (obi= re->instancetable.first; obi; obi= obi->next) {
00803                 if (obi->obr == vo->obr) {
00804                     vol_precache_objectinstance_threads(re, obi, vo->ma);
00805 
00806                     if (re->test_break && re->test_break(re->tbh))
00807                         break;
00808                 }
00809             }
00810 
00811             if (re->test_break && re->test_break(re->tbh))
00812                 break;
00813         }
00814     }
00815     
00816     re->i.infostr= NULL;
00817     re->stats_draw(re->sdh, &re->i);
00818 }
00819 
00820 void free_volume_precache(Render *re)
00821 {
00822     ObjectInstanceRen *obi;
00823     
00824     for (obi= re->instancetable.first; obi; obi= obi->next) {
00825         if (obi->volume_precache != NULL) {
00826             MEM_freeN(obi->volume_precache->data_r);
00827             MEM_freeN(obi->volume_precache->data_g);
00828             MEM_freeN(obi->volume_precache->data_b);
00829             MEM_freeN(obi->volume_precache->bbmin);
00830             MEM_freeN(obi->volume_precache->bbmax);
00831             MEM_freeN(obi->volume_precache);
00832             obi->volume_precache = NULL;
00833         }
00834     }
00835     
00836     BLI_freelistN(&re->volumes);
00837 }
00838 
00839 int point_inside_volume_objectinstance(Render *re, ObjectInstanceRen *obi, float *co)
00840 {
00841     RayObject *tree;
00842     int inside=0;
00843     
00844     tree = makeraytree_object(re, obi);
00845     if (!tree) return 0;
00846     
00847     inside = point_inside_obi(tree, obi, co);
00848     
00849     //TODO: makeraytree_object creates a tree and saves it on OBI, if we free this tree we should also clear other pointers to it
00850     //RE_rayobject_free(tree);
00851     //tree= NULL;
00852     
00853     return inside;
00854 }
